description: The Coastbusters pilot project (2016-2019) explores the use of innovative biostabilisation methods as a coastal protection mechanism, with the aim of achieving the natural increase of sand and strengthening the foreshores against coastal erosion.
keywords: maricultuur, mariculture, coastbusters, Agricultural and aquaculture facilities
name: Coastbusters mariculture project (Belgian part of North Sea, 2016-2019)
